alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Carter; Greenup (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 2:57PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Boyd, southeastern Greenup and northeastern Carter Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 257 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Carter Caves State Park, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Grayson, Princess, Oldtown, Naples, Coalton, Rush, Denton, Gesling, Russell, Hopewell and Hitchins. This includes Interstate 64 in Kentucky between mile markers 162 and 184. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
